H0.text: jharkhand which festival is associated with cattle worship. Makar Sankranti

H1.text: jharkhand which festival is associated with cattle worship. Sarhul

H2.text: jharkhand which festival is associated with cattle worship. Karma

H3.text: jharkhand which festival is associated with cattle worship. Sohrai

A4.text: Sohrai is a harvest festival celebrated in the Indian states of Jharkhand, West Bengal, Chhattisgarh, Odisha, and Bihar.

A5.text: Sohrai is also called the cattle festival.
